title: Garden Defense
instructions:
Instructions:
- Use Arrow Keys to Move.
- Press P to Plant a Sun Plant.
- Press A to Plant an Attack Plant.
- Press N to Advance a Turn.
- Press Z to Undo.
- Press Y to Redo. 
- Press S to Save and name the Save. 
- Press L to load the name of the save. 
- Defend your grid and grow your plants!
autosavePrompt: An auto-save is available. Continue where you left off?
loadPrompt: Enter a save slot name to load:
